      • putNut

        public boolean putNut(int nutColor,
                      int x,
                      int y)
        this method check that player can put a nut at (x, y) coordinate or else
        Parameters:
        nutColor - payer nut color
        x - x coordinate
        y - y coordinate
        Returns:
        if can put at (x, y) return true else return false

      • isValid

        public boolean isValid(int color,
                       int x,
                       int y,
                       boolean edit)
        the method check the give coordinate to put a new nut with given color
        Parameters:
        color - nut to put color
        x - coordinate x
        y - coordinate y
        edit - if it is true map will update and change the nuts else just check the given coordinate for putting a nit with given color
        Returns:
        if we can put nut at given coordinate this method return true else return false

      • updateMap

        private void updateMap(int color,
                       int x,
                       int y,
                       int signX,
                       int signY)
        it is changed the map start from given coordinate and change map color to the given color in the given direction until block colors is different from given color
        Parameters:
        color - color of the new nut
        x - coordinate x
        y - coordinate y
        signX - direction x
        signY - direction y
